title: june 3: the earth is round
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the world’s first globe. After, she remembers Lorde’s debut single “Royals.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
